ygData.subject: Diamond Dust and the Ogres/Gnome in Rathe
ygData.msgSnippet: Do not give your diamond to the ogres in Lake Rathe.  They will not crush it.  I gave one to them, they said thanks and i had to kill him to get it back. Also
ygData.messageBody:
Do not give your diamond to the ogres in Lake Rathe. They will not crush it. I gave one to them, they said thanks and i had to kill him to get it back.
Also tried this with the "gem-cutting" Gnome in rathe mnts by the inn. He just says "hrmm, I guess i'll find some use for this" (even after you talk to him about gem cutting) and obviously you can't kill him to get it back cuz he's a vendor.
Keep looking fellas and when ya do find it, share the wealth!

Surastik
lvl 50 gnome necro
Cazic Thule
